thomson_scattering/midplane.documentation: Choice of midplane definition for the mapping of measurements on an equilibrium. Indicate the IMAS URI of the used equilibrium IDS in the ids_properties/provenance section. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic.

options.name: magnetic_axis
options.description: Midplane defined by the height of magnetic axis equilibrium/time_slice/global_quantities/magnetic_axis/z

options.name: dr_dz_zero_sep
options.description: Midplane defined by the height of the outboard point on the separatrix on which dr/dz = 0 (local maximum of the major radius of the separatrix). In case of multiple local maxima, the closest one from z=z_magnetic_axis is chosen. equilibrium/time_slice/boundary_separatrix/dr_dz_zero_point/z

options.name: ggd_subset
options.description: Midplane location is specified by means of the GGD grid subset for the inner and outer midplanes, if the midplane choice is different from the other available options. If the GGD midplane subset corresponds to one of the other available options, select that particular option to indicate it

thomson_scattering/midplane/name.documentation: Short string identifier. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within midplane container: Choice of midplane definition for the mapping of measurements on an equilibrium. Indicate the IMAS URI of the used equilibrium IDS in the ids_properties/provenance section.

thomson_scattering/midplane/index.documentation: Integer identifier (enumeration index within a list). Private identifier values must be indicated by a negative index. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within midplane container: Choice of midplane definition for the mapping of measurements on an equilibrium. Indicate the IMAS URI of the used equilibrium IDS in the ids_properties/provenance section.

thomson_scattering/midplane/description.documentation: Verbose description. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within midplane container: Choice of midplane definition for the mapping of measurements on an equilibrium. Indicate the IMAS URI of the used equilibrium IDS in the ids_properties/provenance section.

thomson_scattering/channel.documentation: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic.

thomson_scattering/channel/name.documentation: Short string identifier (unique for a given device). Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight).

thomson_scattering/channel/description.documentation: Description, e.g. “channel viewing the upper divertor”. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight).

thomson_scattering/channel/line_of_sight.documentation: Description of the line of sight of the channel, given by 2 points. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight).

Position of the first point. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within line_of_sight container: Description of the line of sight of the channel, given by 2 points.

Major radius. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within line_of_sight container: Description of the line of sight of the channel, given by 2 points. Within first_point container: Position of the first point.

Toroidal angle (oriented counter-clockwise when viewing from above). Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within line_of_sight container: Description of the line of sight of the channel, given by 2 points. Within first_point container: Position of the first point.

Height. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within line_of_sight container: Description of the line of sight of the channel, given by 2 points. Within first_point container: Position of the first point.

Position of the second point. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within line_of_sight container: Description of the line of sight of the channel, given by 2 points.

Major radius. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within line_of_sight container: Description of the line of sight of the channel, given by 2 points. Within second_point container: Position of the second point.

Toroidal angle (oriented counter-clockwise when viewing from above). Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within line_of_sight container: Description of the line of sight of the channel, given by 2 points. Within second_point container: Position of the second point.

Height. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within line_of_sight container: Description of the line of sight of the channel, given by 2 points. Within second_point container: Position of the second point.

thomson_scattering/channel/polychromator.documentation: Index of the polychromator used by this channel (refers to the ../../polychromator array). Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight).

thomson_scattering/channel/scattering_an.documentation: Angle formed by the laser beam wave vector and the line of sight, counted clockwise when projected in the poloidal plane. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight).

thomson_scattering/channel/scattering_le.documentation: Length of the light scattering volume (full width) along the laser beam path, for this line of sight (i.e. length of the intersection between the laser beam and the viewing cone). This is a time average value in case of different lasers fired at different times. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight).

thomson_scattering/channel/solid_angle.documentation: Solid angle of the line of sight. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight).

thomson_scattering/channel/position.documentation: Average position of the measurements (intersection between laser beam and line of sight). Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight).

thomson_scattering/channel/position/r.documentation: Major radius. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within position container: Average position of the measurements (intersection between laser beam and line of sight).

thomson_scattering/channel/position/phi.documentation: Toroidal angle (oriented counter-clockwise when viewing from above). Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within position container: Average position of the measurements (intersection between laser beam and line of sight).

thomson_scattering/channel/position/z.documentation: Height. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within position container: Average position of the measurements (intersection between laser beam and line of sight).

thomson_scattering/channel/delta_positio.documentation: Incremental variation of the position of the measurements, due to e.g. different lasers not intersecting the line of sight at the same position. The actual position is then the static position + delta_position. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight).

Major radius. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within delta_position container: Incremental variation of the position of the measurements, due to e.g. different lasers not intersecting the line of sight at the same position. The actual position is then the static position + delta_position.

Toroidal angle. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within delta_position container: Incremental variation of the position of the measurements, due to e.g. different lasers not intersecting the line of sight at the same position. The actual position is then the static position + delta_position.

Height. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within delta_position container: Incremental variation of the position of the measurements, due to e.g. different lasers not intersecting the line of sight at the same position. The actual position is then the static position + delta_position.

Time for the R,Z,phi coordinates. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within delta_position container: Incremental variation of the position of the measurements, due to e.g. different lasers not intersecting the line of sight at the same position. The actual position is then the static position + delta_position.

thomson_scattering/channel/position_per_.documentation: Position of the intersection between each laser beam and this line of sight. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight).

Major radius. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within position_per_laser container: Position of the intersection between each laser beam and this line of sight.

Toroidal angle (oriented counter-clockwise when viewing from above). Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within position_per_laser container: Position of the intersection between each laser beam and this line of sight.

Height. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within position_per_laser container: Position of the intersection between each laser beam and this line of sight.

thomson_scattering/channel/distance_sepa.documentation: Distance between the measurement position and the separatrix, mapped along flux surfaces to the outboard midplane, in the major radius direction. Positive value means the measurement is outside of the separatrix. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight).

Data. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within distance_separatrix_midplane container: Distance between the measurement position and the separatrix, mapped along flux surfaces to the outboard midplane, in the major radius direction. Positive value means the measurement is outside of the separatrix.

Time. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within distance_separatrix_midplane container: Distance between the measurement position and the separatrix, mapped along flux surfaces to the outboard midplane, in the major radius direction. Positive value means the measurement is outside of the separatrix.

thomson_scattering/channel/t_e.documentation: Electron temperature. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight).

thomson_scattering/channel/t_e/data.documentation: Data. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within t_e container: Electron temperature.

thomson_scattering/channel/t_e/validity_.documentation: Indicator of the validity of the data for each time slice. 0: valid from automated processing, 1: valid and certified by the diagnostic RO; - 1 means problem identified in the data processing (request verification by the diagnostic RO), -2: invalid data, should not be used (values lower than -2 have a code-specific meaning detailing the origin of their invalidity). Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within t_e container: Electron temperature.

thomson_scattering/channel/t_e/validity.documentation: Indicator of the validity of the data for the whole acquisition period. 0: valid from automated processing, 1: valid and certified by the diagnostic RO; - 1 means problem identified in the data processing (request verification by the diagnostic RO), -2: invalid data, should not be used (values lower than -2 have a code-specific meaning detailing the origin of their invalidity). Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within t_e container: Electron temperature.

thomson_scattering/channel/t_e/time.documentation: Time. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within t_e container: Electron temperature.

thomson_scattering/channel/n_e.documentation: Electron density. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight).

thomson_scattering/channel/n_e/data.documentation: Data. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within n_e container: Electron density.

thomson_scattering/channel/n_e/validity_.documentation: Indicator of the validity of the data for each time slice. 0: valid from automated processing, 1: valid and certified by the diagnostic RO; - 1 means problem identified in the data processing (request verification by the diagnostic RO), -2: invalid data, should not be used (values lower than -2 have a code-specific meaning detailing the origin of their invalidity). Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within n_e container: Electron density.

thomson_scattering/channel/n_e/validity.documentation: Indicator of the validity of the data for the whole acquisition period. 0: valid from automated processing, 1: valid and certified by the diagnostic RO; - 1 means problem identified in the data processing (request verification by the diagnostic RO), -2: invalid data, should not be used (values lower than -2 have a code-specific meaning detailing the origin of their invalidity). Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within n_e container: Electron density.

thomson_scattering/channel/n_e/time.documentation: Time. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within n_e container: Electron density.

thomson_scattering/channel/gaussian_fit.documentation: Amplitude of the gaussian fit of the measured signal in each energy band, used to estimate the electron temperature. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight).

thomson_scattering/laser.documentation: Set of probing lasers. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic.

thomson_scattering/laser/energy_in.documentation: Energy of the laser pulse measured just before entering the vacuum vessel. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within laser container: Set of probing lasers.

thomson_scattering/laser/energy_in/data.documentation: Data. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within laser container: Set of probing lasers. Within energy_in container: Energy of the laser pulse measured just before entering the vacuum vessel.

thomson_scattering/laser/energy_in/time.documentation: Time. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within laser container: Set of probing lasers. Within energy_in container: Energy of the laser pulse measured just before entering the vacuum vessel.

thomson_scattering/laser/energy_out.documentation: Energy of the laser pulse measured after crossing the plasma. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within laser container: Set of probing lasers.

thomson_scattering/laser/energy_out/data.documentation: Data. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within laser container: Set of probing lasers. Within energy_out container: Energy of the laser pulse measured after crossing the plasma.

thomson_scattering/laser/energy_out/time.documentation: Time. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within laser container: Set of probing lasers. Within energy_out container: Energy of the laser pulse measured after crossing the plasma.

thomson_scattering/laser/start_point.documentation: Position of the laser start point. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within laser container: Set of probing lasers.

thomson_scattering/laser/start_point/r.documentation: Major radius. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within laser container: Set of probing lasers. Within start_point container: Position of the laser start point.

thomson_scattering/laser/start_point/phi.documentation: Toroidal angle (oriented counter-clockwise when viewing from above). Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within laser container: Set of probing lasers. Within start_point container: Position of the laser start point.

thomson_scattering/laser/start_point/z.documentation: Height. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within laser container: Set of probing lasers. Within start_point container: Position of the laser start point.

thomson_scattering/laser/end_point.documentation: Position of the laser end point. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within laser container: Set of probing lasers.

thomson_scattering/laser/end_point/r.documentation: Major radius. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within laser container: Set of probing lasers. Within end_point container: Position of the laser end point.

thomson_scattering/laser/end_point/phi.documentation: Toroidal angle (oriented counter-clockwise when viewing from above). Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within laser container: Set of probing lasers. Within end_point container: Position of the laser end point.

thomson_scattering/laser/end_point/z.documentation: Height. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within laser container: Set of probing lasers. Within end_point container: Position of the laser end point.

thomson_scattering/laser/wavelength.documentation: Laser wavelength. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within laser container: Set of probing lasers.

thomson_scattering/laser/area.documentation: Laser cross sectional area. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within laser container: Set of probing lasers.

thomson_scattering/polychromator.documentation: Set of polychromators. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic.

thomson_scattering/polychromator/wavelen.documentation: Set of wavelength bands in which photons are counted by the polychromator. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within polychromator container: Set of polychromators.

Lower bound of the detector wavelength range. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within polychromator container: Set of polychromators. Within wavelength_band container: Set of wavelength bands in which photons are counted by the polychromator.

Upper bound of the detector wavelength range. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within polychromator container: Set of polychromators. Within wavelength_band container: Set of wavelength bands in which photons are counted by the polychromator.

Array of wavelength values. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within polychromator container: Set of polychromators. Within wavelength_band container: Set of wavelength bands in which photons are counted by the polychromator.

Probability of detection of a photon impacting the detector as a function of its wavelength. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within polychromator container: Set of polychromators. Within wavelength_band container: Set of wavelength bands in which photons are counted by the polychromator.

thomson_scattering/polychromator/calibra.documentation: Factor to be multiplied by the spectral calibration to obtain the instrument function (fraction of signal received on each energy channel when a photon of relevant energy enters the optical system). Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within polychromator container: Set of polychromators.
Date at which the absolute calibration was carried out. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within polychromator container: Set of polychromators.

Polychromator response function: fraction of signal received on each energy channel when a photon of relevant energy enters the polychromator. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within polychromator container: Set of polychromators.
Date at which the spectral calibration was carried out. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic. Within polychromator container: Set of polychromators.

thomson_scattering/latency.documentation: Upper bound of the delay between physical information received by the detector and data available on the real-time (RT) network. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic.

thomson_scattering/time.documentation: Generic time. Within thomson_scattering IDS: Thomson scattering diagnostic.
